layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: My choices matter because they interact with ordered reality ...

answers.5: absolutely — reality responds consistently to my choices
answers.2: possibly — but the connection feels weak
answers.3: sometimes — some choices matter, others seem random
answers.1: I'm not sure choices really matter — things happen regardless

questions.text: There are better and worse ways to live ...

answers.4: generally — there are real differences in outcomes
answers.5: absolutely — some paths lead to flourishing, others to destruction
answers.2: possibly — but who's to say which is which?
answers.3: in some respects — some things are clearly better, others are preference
answers.1: not objectively — all paths are equally valid

questions.text: Certain behaviors consistently lead to flourishing while others lead to destruction ...

answers.4: usually — cause and effect in behavior is fairly predictable
answers.5: reliably — this is how reality is wired
answers.2: maybe — but there are so many exceptions
answers.3: often — there are patterns, but with significant variation

questions.text: The idea that all choices are equally valid is ...

answers.4: mostly wrong — some choices clearly lead to better outcomes
answers.5: completely wrong — reality distinguishes good choices from bad
answers.2: probably true — we can't really know better or worse
answers.3: partly true — in some areas, but not all
answers.1: true — who am I to judge someone else's path?

questions.text: Human action has meaning because it takes place within structured reality ...
questions.principle: Action has meaning because reality has meaning

answers.4: generally — the structure of reality gives action significance
answers.5: absolutely — meaning flows from the ordered nature of existence
answers.2: possibly — but meaning might be something we create
answers.3: somewhat — actions matter in some contexts more than others
answers.1: I'm not sure action has inherent meaning

remediation.advice: If choices feel meaningless, observe the patterns. Some people's lives work; others fall apart. The difference isn't luck — it's choices interacting with an ordered reality. Your decisions matter because the world has structure.

scripture.text: There is a way that seems right to a man, but its end is the way to death.
